thread.title: Extra Bonus Quote of the Day
thread.title_full: Extra Bonus Quote of the Day

author: Taegan Goddard
title: Extra Bonus Quote of the Day
text:
Extra Bonus Quote of the Day October 5, 2015 
“I did sacrifice a goat. I know that’s probably a quibble in the mind of most Americans. I sacrificed an animal to the god of the wilderness … Yes, I drank the goat’s blood.” 
— Florida U.S. Senate candidate Augustus Sol Invictus (L), quoted by the Associated Press . Related Posts Never miss a Political Wire post Your email address: * Please enter all required fields Correct invalid entries
